import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {useState} from "react"; import authApi from "../../utils/authApi"; import logo from "../../images/logo.svg" export default function Register() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() authApi.signup(email, password).then(() => { alert("Вы успешно зарегистрированы") }).catch(console.error) } return (<>

Регистрация

setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} />

Уже зарегистрированы? Войти

) }
